channel.title: wordcloud on Playing with data
channel.description: Recent content in wordcloud on Playing with data

item.title: Please like me
item.description: Sundays When I woke up this morning I wrote a long to do list. Instead of working through the list I somehow ended up spending most of my day playing in R. Scraping the web I have been keen to try web scraping in R for a while so I gave rvest a go. I was a bit too restless to actually read any tutorials so I just started trying different commands.
